text: Cher ’ s early review of “ The Cher Show ” is in, and she gives it a definite, eh. Over the weekend the actress and singer quietly sneaked into Chicago where the Broadway - bound play is set to debut. After catching preview performances, she declared that the musical about her life could use a little more life. “ Some times, I was having a blast. Some times, my mind was wandering. I think those are the parts that are going to get better, ” she said in a Q & A with the Chicago Tribune. Never one to hold back, Cher said the production is a work in progress. “ Some parts of it are really fabulous.
